snippet.title: Divine Doubt (Demo) | RPG Maker Game | No Commentary
snippet.description:
*Apologies for some of the scuff that happens sometimes (like cuts). OBS does not like recording MV games.

Game: Divine Doubt (Demo)
Find the game here: https://meatpie.itch.io/divine-doubt
Original creator: Team Meatpie
Release Date: 2023 (Demo)
Engine: RPG Maker MV
I do NOT own anything on this video, all credit to their respective creators.

If the creator wants me to take this down, please tell me.
もしクリエイターがこれを削除することを望むなら、私に言ってほしい。 (DeepL)

I've been keeping an eye on Team Meatpie ever since Turtle Head: Unmasked demo came out and also played Sleepy Sheep Chapter 1 when that also came out and it's always so nice to see devs improving with every one of their games. It's inspiring in a way.

I really liked the demo and it has me interested in seeing where it will go in the full game. I liked the art, the cutscenes, and just had a good time overall. I find the premise interesting and it will be cool to see where it will go.
